s: Qihoo 360, officially known as Qihoo 360 Technology Co. Ltd. is an internet and computer security software provider. The company was founded in 2005 by Zhou Hongyi and Qi Xiangdong in Beijing, China and provides various security solutions for computer and mobile users around the world.
